text: Norman David Shumway (born July 28, 1934 ) is an American Republican politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from California's 14th congressional district from 1979 to 1991. ==Other websites== *California Public Utilities Commission statement Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from California Category:Politicians from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Norman D. Shumway
